attributes.action: To ensure all children have access to music lessons and instruments in school.
attributes.additional_details:
Article recently written in the Guardian. 
https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2017/mar/27/music-lessons-children-white-wealthy
attributes.background: Music lessons and instruments have become increasingly hard to access in schools with some schools no longer offering any kind of music provision. Music Services have been closing down and if we fail to act now it will not be long before music education is only for the wealthy.
